title: Katarina Unlocked Daggers
body:
So my Kata came in the mail today and loving it. My only problem is that I don't really know how I'm going to get her to hold the daggers without having a potential accident.

How do I get her to hold them safely?

replies.body:
I've been told that her hands are pretty dang tough, so you can slide the daggers in sideways without much risk of breaking anything. 

Let me know if you need me to clarify further~ ^.^

Had the exact same question. Managed to do it following your comment. May I suggest adding a small paper with instructions for future figures  (when needed)? I've broken accessories like this in the past because I didn't know what I was supposed to do.

Anyhow, thanks for the help !

Just did what you suggested and it worked. Felt tense doing it but they are tougher than what I thought. 

Thx for the clarity.{{champion:55}}  is happy she didn't lose any fingers too. :P
